summary: This is an NCIC Interstate Identification Index response from the FBI and New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, providing criminal history record information for Ryan Dionne in response to an inquiry. It includes identifying details, aliases, and indicates the record is maintained by the FBI.

persons.name: Ryan Dionne
persons.context: Individual whose criminal history record was searched via NCIC by the FBI/New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services. The record includes aliases and identifying details.

events.title: NCIC criminal history inquiry for Ryan Dionne
events.description: The FBI and New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services conducted an NCIC Interstate Identification Index search on Ryan Dionne, retrieving his criminal history record maintained by the FBI.

events.title: Criminal record identification data update
events.description: The identification data for Ryan Dionne's criminal history record was last updated.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: An NCIC criminal history inquiry was conducted on Ryan Dionne on December 12, 2021.
Ryan Dionne has aliases listed: Ryan David Dionne and Ryan Dionne.
His criminal history record is maintained by the FBI under number 827028H81.
The record includes identifying details: date of birth June 1, 1978, physical descriptors, and a tattoo on the chin and right arm.
The response was generated by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services in coordination with the FBI.
